entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@atrupar If the relative risks in the White House are such that hydroxycloroquine is even being considered by a doctor, a reasonable person could be forgiven for concluding that the White House could be a hot zone...

#COVID19
